SELECT A.ID AS RESUME_ID, A.TITLE, A.EDUCATION, A.PREFERRED_LOCATION, A.SKILLS, B.NAME FROM resumes A, USERS B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.ID AND A.is_public = 1
AND A.PREFERRED_LOCATION IN
#{loc}
AND (
FIND_IN_SET(#{stackId}, A.skills) > 0
)
AND ( A.desired_position LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR A.core_competency LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY A.id DESC
SELECT A.*, B.NAME AS applicantName, B.EMAIL, C.PHONE_NUMBER FROM RESUMES A, USERS B, APPLICANT_PROFILES C WHERE A.id = #{resumeId} AND A.USER_ID = B.ID AND B.ID = C.USER_ID
